    • Constructor Detail

      • FileChain

        public FileChain(java.lang.String path,
                 boolean singleNode,
                 File... node)
          throws FileException
        Create a new file chain from File.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the base file.
        singleNode - Whether or not it is a single file or not.
        node - Array of files to be added to chain.
        Throws:
        FileException - If singleNode and node do not match.
